mapper.select: select from Quotation a where a.id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM Quotation a WHERE 1=1
and a.interCode like '%'||#{interCode}||'%'
and a.marketCode like '%'||#{marketCode}||'%'
and a.kindCode like '%'||#{kindCode}||'%'
and a.currencyNo like '%'||#{currencyNo}||'%'
and a.quotationTime = #{quotationTime}
